/**
 * title: od_matrix_directed_consecutive_pairs_per_day
 * author: Innocent Obi Jr
 * description: 
 */
 
//Default configurations (Remove in production)
sc.hadoopConfiguration.set("fs.s3n.awsAccessKeyId", System.getenv("AWS_ID"))
sc.hadoopConfiguration.set("fs.s3n.awsSecretAccessKey", System.getenv("AWS_SECRET"))

val path_to_cdrs : String = "s3n://sierra-leone-lake/blob/cdrs/africell-raw/20200403_1[4-6].csv"
val path_to_towers : String = "s3n://sierra-leone-lake/blob/TOWERS/africell/sites_2020-07-03.csv"
val path_to_ouput : String =  "s3n://sierra-leone-lake/blob/AGGREGATED_CDRS/africell/od_matrix_directed_consecutive_pairs_per_day"
val cutoff : Int = 15

msg.data:
path_to_cdrs: String = s3n://sierra-leone-lake/blob/cdrs/africell-raw/20200403_1[4-6].csv
path_to_towers: String = s3n://sierra-leone-lake/blob/TOWERS/africell/sites_2020-07-03.csv
path_to_ouput: String = s3n://sierra-leone-lake/blob/AGGREGATED_CDRS/africell/od_matrix_directed_consecutive_pairs_per_day
cutoff: Int = 15

paragraphs.text:
/**
 * 
 */

import org.apache.spark.sql.functions.{split, lit, window, concat, unix_timestamp, to_timestamp, date_format}
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
//import org.apache.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.Window
import spark.implicits._
import org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel

 val calls = spark.read.format("csv")
    .option("header","false")
    .option("inferSchema", "true")
    .load(path_to_cdrs)
    .withColumnRenamed("_c0", "antenna_id")
    .withColumnRenamed("_c1", "time")
    .withColumnRenamed("_c2", "direction")
    .withColumnRenamed("_c3", "source")
    .withColumn("msisdn", col("source"))
    .withColumnRenamed("_c4", "target")
    .withColumnRenamed("_c5", "duration")
    .withColumn("site_id", substring(col("antenna_id"), 0, 4))
    .withColumn("call_datetime", to_timestamp($"time"))
    .withColumn("call_date", to_date($"call_datetime"))
    .withColumn("end_time",  to_timestamp(unix_timestamp($"call_datetime") + ($"duration")))
    

val cells = spark.read.format("csv")
  .option("header", true)
  .option("inferSchema", true)
  .load(path_to_towers)
  .withColumnRenamed("New_Dist", "locality")
  .withColumnRenamed("CI", "cell_id")

cells.persist(StorageLevel.MEMORY_AND_DISK)
cells.createOrReplaceTempView("cells")

calls.persist(StorageLevel.MEMORY_AND_DISK)
calls.createOrReplaceTempView("calls")

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions.{split, lit, window, concat, unix_timestamp, to_timestamp, date_format}
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.Window
import spark.implicits._
import org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel
calls: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [antenna_id: int, time: timestamp ... 9 more fields]
cells: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [site_id: string, cell_id: int ... 8 more fields]

paragraphs.text:
val odMatrixDirectedConsecutivePairsPerDay = spark.sql(s"""
    WITH located AS (SELECT msisdn,
                             locality,
                             call_date,
                             row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY msisdn, call_date
                                                ORDER BY call_datetime ASC) AS rank
                      FROM calls
                           INNER JOIN cells ON calls.site_id = cells.site_id
                      WHERE (calls.call_date >= '2020-02-01')
                        AND (calls.call_date <= CURRENT_DATE))

       SELECT call_date,
              locality_from,
              locality_to,
              count(*)
       FROM (SELECT source.msisdn,
                    source.call_date,
                    source.locality AS locality_from,
                    sink.locality AS locality_to
             FROM located AS source
                  INNER JOIN (SELECT msisdn,
                                     locality,
                                     call_date,
                                     rank - 1 AS rank
                              FROM located) AS sink USING (msisdn, call_date, rank)
             GROUP BY msisdn, call_date, locality_from, locality_to) AS joined
       GROUP BY call_date, locality_from, locality_to
       HAVING count(*) > 15 
""")
odMatrixDirectedConsecutivePairsPerDay.createOrReplaceTempView("od_matrix_directed_consecutive_pairs_per_day")
